pr_title: Update metrics tests to use Iceberg generics

timeline.message:
Update TestMetrics to use Iceberg generics.

This is to support ORC metrics using the same tests. ORC doesn't support
writing Avro records.

timeline.bodyText: Sorry if I'm missing some context, but why is the uuidCol dropped?
timeline.author: edgarRd
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -95,59 +88,57 @@
       optional(8, "dateCol", DateType.get()),
       required(9, "timeCol", TimeType.get()),
       required(10, "timestampCol", TimestampType.withoutZone()),
-      optional(11, "uuidCol", UUIDType.get()),
-      required(12, "fixedCol", FixedType.ofLength(4)),
-      required(13, "binaryCol", BinaryType.get())
+      required(11, "fixedCol", FixedType.ofLength(4)),

replies.bodyText: UUID columns aren't currently supported in the Parquet writers for Iceberg generics. Rather than adding that support here, I thought it was better to remove it. We can add it back later, but I don't want to block ORC metrics on it.
replies.author: rdblue

timeline.bodyText: is the test name misleading? Seems like we are testing for multiple records, not repeated values in maps and lists
timeline.author: rdsr

replies.bodyText: I think it sounds like we were testing repeated values in maps and lists.
replies.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: Since this is an existing test name, I'd rather not update it in this PR. We can open a separate one to fix it if you think it is necessary.
replies.author: rdblue

timeline.bodyText: nit: seems like comment is not adding anything more
timeline.author: rdsr
